voteBook.title: 毎週
voteBook.noSecectBook: 投票する本を選んでください
voteBook.noAccess: このイベントに参加しました
voteBook.voteRuleText:
1. 10冊の中から投票数の多かった3冊を選出し、来週発売予定。
2.1 wcm は新しい本に投票する機会を表しており、投票数に制限はありません。
3. WCM は、この投票活動に参加するための証明書としてのみ使用され、凍結または控除されることはありません。

wcmWlbox.title: WCM+RCM
wcmWlbox.ruleContent:
Users can use 88wcm+388rcm to exchange for WL-Box. WL-Box is limited to 100 pieces, first come first served, while stocks last. 
 The same user can redeem multiple times.
The duration of the event is subject to the official announcement of Read2N.
wcmWlbox.noWlBox: Sorry,all  WL Box have been released.

auctionBook.title: WCM+RCM
auctionBook.ruleContent:
1. users can use WCM+RCM to obtain copyright governance NFT through bidding. each user can make multiple offers within the specified time, without covering historical offers (i.e. each offer is valid). 
 2. 25 WCM is required for each bid, and the number of RCM is required to be no less than 150. quotes are rounded up to the nearest whole number, and the number of RCM increases by a minimum of 10 for each upward quote. 
 3. The current offer can be modified (the modified price cannot be lower than the current offer). 
 4. After the end of the offer, the top 24 will be ranked according to the offer from the highest to the lowest, and the corresponding tokens will be deducted according to the offer of the 24th place. (According to the number of prize pools configured in the background). 
 5. During the bidding period, the corresponding WCM and RCM will be temporarily locked, and will be deducted if the bidding is successful, and refunded to the account if the bidding is not successful.
 6. At the end of the event, 50 WCM will be given to each of the first 10 people and 25 WCM to each of the 10-20 people.
auctionBook.platformDesc: Deduct from balance, return if not successful
auctionBook.noNft: Sorry, all NFTs for this book have been released.
auctionBook.failText: The NFT was not drawn this time, you can wait for the new book to be released next time.

auctionWlBox.title: RCM Bidding
auctionWlBox.ruleContent:
1. Users can bid for WL Box using RCM. Each user can make multiple quotations within the specified time, not covering the historical quotation (that is, each quotation is valid). 

 2. The starting number of RCM shall not be less than 400. The quote should be an integer, and the RCM should increase the amount of each upward quote by at least 10. 

 3. The current quotation can be modified (the modified price cannot be lower than the current quotation). 

 4. After the quotation is finished, the top 50 will be ranked according to the quotation from highest to lowest, and the corresponding tokens will be deducted from the quotation of the top 50.

 5. During the bidding period, the corresponding RCM will be temporarily locked and deducted if the bidding succeeds. If the bidding fails, it will be returned to the account.

 6. At the end of the event, give 50WCM to the first 10 people and 25WCM to 10-30 people.
auctionWlBox.platformDesc: Deduct from balance, return if not successful
auctionWlBox.noNft: Sorry, all WL-BOX for this book have been released.
auctionWlBox.failText: The WL-BOX  was not drawn this time, you can wait for the next time.

suggestion.title: Product Feature
suggestion.ruleContent:
1. Users can use WCM to participate in product experience research and voting. Each WCM can vote for or against once, and there is no limit to the number of votes. (WCM is only used as a voting voucher and will not be frozen or deducted) 

2. The survey voting results will be displayed, and the project team will refer to them according to the voting ranking order.
suggestion.noAccess: Sorry, you have already participated in this event
suggestion.noWcmText: Sorry, you do not have enough WCM to participate in this event

bnbLottery.title: 《魔窟》
bnbLottery.ruleContent:
1.ユーザーは1RCMを消費して抽選に参加できます。ユーザー1人あたり最大5回参加できます。
2. 1等賞1名、0.7BNBを獲得。2等賞1名、0.2BNBを獲得。3等賞1名、0.1BNBを獲得。1等賞と2等賞の当選者は「魔窟」NFTの所有者である必要があります。3等賞には制限はありません。
bnbLottery.sliderDesc: RCMの抽選機会を選択済み：
bnbLottery.noAccessTitle: 非アクティブユーザー
bnbLottery.noAccess: 申し訳ありませんが、アカウントに十分なRCMがあるかどうか確認してください。
bnbLottery.successText: 応募が完了しました。抽選結果をお待ちください。
bnbLottery.failText: 申し訳ありませんが、あなたは当選されていません。
